hero.subtitle: Discover unique landscapes on unforgettable horseback rides through the Andes.

cabalgatas.title: Our Horse Riding Tours
cabalgatas.subtitle: Unique expeditions in the Andes Mountains
cabalgatas.description: Choose your perfect adventure. From one-day horse rides to multi-day expeditions with camping under the stars.

cruce-andes.title: ANDES CROSSING
cruce-andes.description: The most authentic Andes crossing experience
cruce-andes.fullDescription: A unique experience crossing the Andes Mountains following General San Martín's footsteps. We'll traverse unique landscapes with spectacular panoramic views.

avion-uruguayos.title: URUGUAYAN PLANE HORSE RIDING
avion-uruguayos.description: Expedition through the scenario of "The Andes Tragedy"
avion-uruguayos.fullDescription: Travel to the site where the famous 1972 plane crash occurred. A survival and reflection experience in the Andes.
highlights: Visit to the historic crash site

los-molles.title: LOS MOLLES HORSE RIDING
los-molles.description: Experience the mountain in two unique days
los-molles.fullDescription: A perfect getaway to discover the Mendoza Andes. Ideal for beginners seeking their first horseback riding experience.

tres-valles.title: 3 VALLEYS HORSE RIDING
tres-valles.description: In this three-day experience you will be able to enjoy the magic of sunsets.
tres-valles.fullDescription: Explore three unique valleys of the Mendoza Andes. An intermediate experience perfect for enjoying nature.
highlights: Three unique valleys in one trip

expertos.title: EXPERT HORSE RIDING
expertos.description: A challenging experience for experienced riders in mountainous terrain.
expertos.fullDescription: The biggest challenge for experienced riders. Demanding terrain and unique high mountain landscapes.

semana-santa.title: EASTER WEEK HORSE RIDING
semana-santa.description: Special Easter expedition with cultural activities and unique landscapes
semana-santa.fullDescription: A special experience designed for Easter Week. Combines tradition, culture and the natural beauty of the Andes.
